name: United States
key_requirements:
• Facility registration with FDA
  • Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) compliance
  • Proper labeling including major food allergens
  • GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) status for food additives
  • New Dietary Ingredient (NDI) notification if applicable
import_requirements:
• FDA registration for food facilities
  • Prior notice for food imports
  • Compliance with FDA food safety regulations
  • Product labeling in English
export_requirements:
• FDA export certificate if required by destination country
  • Compliance with destination country requirements
labeling_requirements:
• Ingredient list in descending order
  • Nutrition facts panel
  • Allergen declarations
  • FDA required statements
testing_requirements:
• Microbiological testing
  • Heavy metals testing
  • Pesticide residue testing
  • Aloin content verification
approval_process:
• Facility registration
  • Product formulation review
  • Label review and approval
  • Pre-market notification (if required)
notes: Requirements may vary based on specific product formulation and intended use.

name: Canada
key_requirements:
• Natural Health Product License
  • Good Manufacturing Practices compliance
  • Product license application
  • Clinical evidence for health claims
import_requirements:
• Import permit from Health Canada
  • Product registration
  • Compliance with Canadian regulations
export_requirements:
• Export certificate from Health Canada
  • Compliance with destination requirements
labeling_requirements:
• Bilingual labeling (English/French)
  • Natural Product Number (NPN)
  • Proper health claims
  • Dosage instructions
required_certifications:
• Natural Health Product License
  • Site license for manufacturing
  • GMP certification
notes: Natural Health Product pathway is most common for aloe vera products in Canada.

name: Australia
key_requirements:
• Food Standards Code compliance
  • HACCP implementation
  • Ingredient approval
  • Manufacturing standards
import_requirements:
• Import permit for therapeutic goods
  • Quarantine clearance
  • Food safety compliance
notes: Classification depends on intended use and health claims made.
